title: Werecyborg

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a New Moon, roleblock a player.
- During a Full Moon, redirect a player at random.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Hunting Moon Enhancement — **Cyberization** — *Overloaded* — You may have your ability target every player in the game. If you do, yourself and each player that can win with you gains a level of defense equal to the number of em dashes (—) in their rolecard.

desc:
Post 3741
*remind me to think of flavourtext later*
Roleblock and redirect immune while Overloaded
